Text: IIR Presents Investing in Mezzanine Financepst IMAGEInstitute for International Research Leading the Information Generation INVESTING IN MEZZANINE FINANCE February Roosevelt Hotel in New York City Register Conference Agenda Download Brochure Conference Overview Dear Vince In ever increasing numbers fund managers are allocating a portion of their funds under management to alternative investments Mezzanine capital is now attracting new investors looking to diversify into investments that offer a fixed income allocation and in some deals equity appreciation as well To take advantage of opportunities in the market get up to speed on the nuances of the mezzanine market Join us at IIRs Investing in Mezzanine Finance conference on February at the Roosevelt Hotel in New York City where we will explore this area of the private capital market Gain knowledge about the opportunities available in mezzanine investing from the sponsors and investors who have firsthand experience in issuing and investing in debt and equity mezzanine deals Investors will Hear from experienced mezzanine investors and providers to learn their investment decision for both fund allocation and direct mezzanine programs See why the mezzanine market is providing a preferred alternative to the high yield market Identify how mezzanine compares and contrastswith other private equity investments Focus on pricing trends in the mezzanine market Learn what capital structures are being used and new hybrid products Gain insight into workouts liquidity alternatives and the secondary market in mezzanine To register for this event click here or call Please mention priority code UXXEM when registering I look forward to seeing you in New York Sincerely Judy Kotula Vice President IIR PS Plan Sponsors Qualified Investors Save off the Registration Fee If you would prefer not to receive further messages from this sender Click on the Reply button Replace the Subject field with the word REMOVE Click the Send button You will receive one additional email message confirming your removal
